title-part.text: BELTS, CABLES, OR ROPES, PREDOMINANTLY USED FOR DRIVING PURPOSES

note.note-paragraph:
Attention is drawn to the following places:
B63B21/04 Fastening equipment for chains, ropes or the like for ships
B63B21/20 Adaptations of chains, ropes or the like for ships
B65G15/30 Endless conveyor belts
B65G17/38, B65G19/20 Traction chains for conveyors
F16H Gearings using flexible members
F16H9/24 Chains specially adapted for gearings with variable ratio
H05F Preventing or carrying-off electrostatic charges.
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

reference.text: F16G1/28 takes precedence; making thereof C14B9/00

title-part.text: made of fibrous material, e.g. textiles, whether rubber-covered or not

reference.text: F16G1/28 takes precedence; making thereof D03D
F16G1/28 takes precedence; making thereof B29D29/00

title-part.text: with reinforcement bonded by the rubber

reference.text: F16G1/28 takes precedence; making thereof B29D29/00

title-part.text: with reinforcement bonded by the plastic material
made of a single metal strip
built-up from superimposed layers, e.g. zig-zag folded

reference.text: in the shape of chain links F16G13/08

title-part.text: in the form of strips or lamellae
with a contact surface of special shape, e.g. toothed
Belt fastenings, e.g. for conveyor belts

CPC-specific-text.text: Apparatus or tools for joining belts
Traction devices to bring together belts, cables or chains

title-part.text: with series of eyes or the like, interposed and linked by a pin to form a hinge
in which the ends of separate U-shaped or like eyes are attached to the belt by parts penetrating into it
Friction clamps, e.g. of grommet-thimble type
consisting of plates and screw-bolts or rivets
Joining belts by sewing, sticking, vulcanising, or the like
Constructional adaptations of the belt ends for this purpose
Devices or machines for connecting driving-belts or the like
V-belts, i.e. belts of tapered cross-section
with reinforcement bonded by the rubber
with reinforcement bonded by the plastic material
with a contact surface of special shape, e.g. toothed
Ropes or cables specially adapted for driving, or for being driven by, pulleys or other gearing elements

reference.text: ropes or cables in general D07B

title-part.text: having enveloping sheathings made of leather
Means for fastening cables or ropes to one another or to other objects
Caps or sleeves for fixing on cables or ropes

reference.text: attaching ropes or cables to lift cars or cages B66B7/08, to winch drums or barrels B66D1/34; ground anchors E02D5/00; anchoring devices for prestressed members E04C5/00; rope clamps in earth drilling E21B19/12

title-part.text: with parts deformable to grip the cable or cables
Fastening means which engage a sleeve or the like fixed on the cable

CPC-specific-text.text: Fastening means which engage a sleeve or the like fixed on the cable, e.g. caps

title-part.text: incorporating resiliently-mounted members for attachment of the cable end
with wedging action, e.g. friction clamps

CPC-specific-text.text: eyes for grommet-thimble type fastenings F16G11/146
using solidifying liquid material forming a wedge
friction clamps deforming the cable, wire, rope or cord
by bending the cable around a surface
by moving a surface into the cable

title-part.text: by using conical plugs insertable between the strands
Fastenings for securing ends of driving-cables to one another, the fastenings having approximately the same diameter as the cables
incorporating hinge joints or pivots for the attachment of the cable ends
Clamps holding in one direction only

CPC-specific-text.text: deforming the cable by moving a part of the fastener
deforming the cable by bending it around or inserting it into the fastener
Clamps holding in one direction only
using a ball or a cylinder

title-part.text: Connections or attachments, e.g. turnbuckles, adapted for straining of cables, ropes, or wire
Devices or coupling-pieces designed for easy formation of adjustable loops, e.g. choker hooks
Hooks or eyes with integral parts designed to facilitate quick attachment to cables or ropes at any point, e.g. by forming loops

reference.text: specially adapted to gearings with variable gear-ratio F16H9/00

title-part.text: with links connected by parallel driving-pins with or without rollers

reference.text: if the parallel coupling pins have only a joining function - so called closed links - F16G13/02

title-part.text: the links being of identical shape, e.g. cranked
with links closely interposed on the joint pins
with arrangements for holding electric cables, hoses, or the like
for fastening more or less permanently

CPC-specific-text.text: chain links with rapid junction means are classified according to the corresponding kind of chain

title-part.text: Shackles designed for attachment by joint pins to chain elements, e.g. D-shackles

CPC-specific-text.text: so called harp links; the D-chain links are classified according to the corresponding kind of chain

title-part.text: made of sheet metal, e.g. profiled
Hooks as integral parts of chains

reference.text: hooks for cranes B66C1/34; hooks in general F16B45/00
